title: IOS/Android Developer
full_description: Hi , This is Smith from Yochana Solutions; We are looking IOS/Android Developer Located in San Diego, CA the below mentioned job description. Kindly forward me your resume, rate and contact details for further process at smith@yochana.com or reach me at 949-201-1313.Job Title: IOS/Android DeveloperLocation: San Diego, CA (Initially Remote for few months later onsite)Duration: Long Term  Job Description  Able to architect solutions on native app for iOS and Android mobile platforms.Good knowledge on common design patterns, frameworks and libraries for mobile development (iOS and Android).Able to design, develop & Prototype Android, iOS native applications for phones and tablets for internal and external use.Good understanding of full app life-cycle (concept, design, build, deploy, test and release to app store).Good knowledge on Swift, Objective-C (iOS) and Java (Android) programming languages. In-depth knowledge of multi-threaded and memory management specific to mobile application.  Thanks and Regards, SmithSr. Technical RecruiterYochana Solutions INC23000 Commerce Dr, Farmington hills, MI-48335Direct No: 949-201-1313smith@yochana.com || www.yochana.comNote: This is not an unsolicited mail. If you are not interested in receiving our e-mails then please reply with subject line Remove
